name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client-am.ipc.max-retries
description:
The number of client retries to the AM - before reconnecting
    to the RM to fetch Application Status.
    In other words, it is the ipc.client.connect.max.retries to be used during
    reconnecting to the RM and fetching Application Status.

name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
description:
The number of streams to merge at once while sorting
  files.  This determines the number of open file handles.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.max.disk.errors
description:
During a block move from a source to destination disk, we might
      encounter various errors. This defines how many errors we can tolerate
      before we declare a move between 2 disks (or a step) has failed.

name: nfs.server.port
description: Specify the port number used by Hadoop NFS.

name: dfs.namenode.block.deletion.increment
description:
The number of block deletion increment.
      This setting will control the block increment deletion rate to
      ensure that other waiters on the lock can get in.

name: dfs.encrypt.data.transfer.cipher.key.bitlength
description:
The key bitlength negotiated by dfsclient and datanode for encryption.
    This value may be set to either 128, 192 or 256.

name: mapreduce.client.submit.file.replication
description:
The replication level for submitted job files.  This
  should be around the square root of the number of nodes.
